topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: Yearn Finance's yETH product was exploited, leading to an attacker minting an unlimited amount of yETH and draining liquidity from Balancer pools. The incident involved heavy on-chain movement, including 100 ETH transfers through Tornado Cash. Sources: - https://t.me/curvefi - https://beincrypto.com/yearn-finance-yeth-exploit-drains-millions
